name: TarotOfficeHours
0:
”Alexa, open tarot office hours”
”Alexa, start tarot office hours”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tarot office hours
des:
About to start work* for the day? Ask Alexa to draw a tarot card on daily themes, productivity hacks, or potential obstacles.

*Not limited to the office or to academic work. It's applicable whenever you're trying to get a plan to completion or a project off the ground.

Say "Alexa, start tarot office hours" or "Alexa, open tarot office hours" to begin. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.

Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
